a:2:{s:6:"fields";a:2:{i:0;O:8:"stdClass":13:{s:4:"name";s:2:"id";s:5:"table";s:10:"categories";s:3:"def";s:0:"";s:10:"max_length";i:0;s:8:"not_null";i:1;s:11:"primary_key";i:1;s:12:"multiple_key";i:0;s:10:"unique_key";i:0;s:7:"numeric";i:1;s:4:"blob";i:0;s:4:"type";s:3:"int";s:8:"unsigned";i:1;s:8:"zerofill";i:0;}i:1;O:8:"stdClass":13:{s:4:"name";s:4:"name";s:5:"table";s:10:"categories";s:3:"def";s:0:"";s:10:"max_length";i:0;s:8:"not_null";i:1;s:11:"primary_key";i:0;s:12:"multiple_key";i:0;s:10:"unique_key";i:0;s:7:"numeric";i:0;s:4:"blob";i:0;s:4:"type";s:6:"string";s:8:"unsigned";i:0;s:8:"zerofill";i:0;}}s:4:"data";a:0:{}}
